title: 120 Best 25th Anniversary Wishes for Friends, Parents, & Couples

steps.title: Celebrate the love of your favorite couple.
steps.content: Celebrate the love of your favorite couple. If you know a couple that’s celebrating 25 years of marriage, that’s a huge milestone! Let them know how much you admire their accomplishment and wish them luck for the years to come. Here are some examples: [1] X Research source “Happy 25th wedding anniversary to the happiest couple I know!” “Happy 25th anniversary to both of you! Congratulations on reaching a milestone made of love and trust.” “Congratulations on the silver jubilee of your wedding! The bond you two have is so inspiring.” “25 years down and many more to go! Happy silver anniversary!” “May your love story never end. Wishing you a very happy 25th anniversary!” “Your love is a true testament to what it means to be soulmates. I am so happy that you found each other. Happy anniversary!” “As you celebrate 25 years together, we are reminded that true love stands the test of time. Congratulations on reaching the silver mark. Happy anniversary!” “May your love continue to be a shining example of commitment and joy. Happy 25th anniversary!” “Congratulations on 25 years! May you continue to make many beautiful memories together.” “Cheers to 25 years of love, laughter, and countless cherished memories. Happy silver anniversary!” “Happy 25th anniversary! You two are still a wonderful couple, even after all these years.” “It takes a lot of effort and sacrifice to be where you are right now. And for that, I would like to say congratulations and happy 25th anniversary!” “Congrats on your silver wedding anniversary! Wishing you all the best for your future together.” “Looks like fairytales exist after all! Happy 25th anniversary!” “Congratulations on 25 years! The bond you two share is remarkable and inspiring to see!”

steps.title: Cheer your friends’ marriage on.
steps.content: Cheer your friends’ marriage on. Let your friends know how special they are to you by celebrating their milestone anniversary. If you’ve known them for years, consider talking about how they’ve grown and changed for the better. Or, simply let them know how happy you are that they found each other. Here are some examples: [2] X Research source “Happy 25th anniversary to the best team ever! You’re a perfect example of how two people can live a fulfilling life together.” “Happy anniversary, guys! You two have been a perfect pair. We wish nothing but the best for you and your marriage.” “Cheers to the most dynamic couple in our gang. You guys have proved that true love triumphs, no matter what. Happy 25th anniversary!” “You two are the perfect example of what it means to be soulmates. I am so happy that you found each other. Happy anniversary!” “25 years of love, laughter, and togetherness—you’ve shown us that happily ever afters are more than just a fairytale ending. Congratulations on this special milestone!” “I have never seen a couple so romantic even after all these years of marriage. You’re an inspiration to us all! Happy anniversary.” “Happy silver anniversary, lovebirds! Wishing you all the best!” “When you first got married, you were one of the happiest and most romantic couples I’d ever seen. I’m so happy that that hasn’t changed over the last 25 years! Happy anniversary!” “Time flies by when you are with someone you love. No wonder you guys made 25 years seem like 25 days. Happy 25th anniversary!” “My best wishes to both of you on this special day! Congratulations on celebrating 25 years together!” “Your 25 years together have been like a rom-com, so I guess that makes me the quirky sidekick. Happy anniversary!” “Even after all these years, I have never seen a couple so in love. I’ll always look to you two for advice on how to keep a happy marriage going. Happy anniversary!” “Here’s to the two incredible people who’ve made 25 years of love look like a walk in the park. I wish you both endless happiness. Happy anniversary!” “Happy 25th Anniversary! So proud of you both! What a special occasion to celebrate your love.” “Happy 25th anniversary! You two make it seem so easy.”

steps.title: Let your parents know how much you admire them.
steps.content: Let your parents know how much you admire them. Often, your parents’ relationship is the first example of romantic love you see, which can greatly impact how you view romance later on. If you admire your parents’ relationship, tell them. As you celebrate their 25th anniversary , let them know what a positive impact they’ve made on you over the years. Here are some examples: [3] X Research source “25 years of pure bliss and we’re all counting on 25 more. Happy 25th wedding anniversary, Mom and Dad!” “Happy 25th anniversary! I am so proud to call you my parents. You’ve taught me that a strong, trusting partnership is the key to a happy family.” “Happy anniversary, Mom and Dad! You’ve always taught me to be patient, kind, and respectful, and I hope to have a love as long lasting as yours.” “Your love for each other is always what made our house a home. Happy 25th anniversary to the best parents in the world.” “To the best parents ever—happy 25th anniversary! I hope to have a love story as great as yours someday.” “Mom and Dad, you are my role models. Thank you for teaching me what it means to love and be loved. Happy 25th anniversary!” “Happy 25th anniversary to the best parents anyone could ask for! I am so grateful to have been a firsthand witness to a love story so beautiful as yours.” “Thanks for all the precious moments and the sweetest memories over these years. I love you both more than anything in the world. Happy 25th anniversary!” “Happy 25th anniversary to my amazing parents. You two are the reason I believe in soulmates.” “Happy 25th anniversary, Mom and Dad! Your love story will always be my favorite.” “If there was a couple like you in every family, this world would be so much more romantic, happy, and colorful. Congratulations on the silver jubilee, Mom and Dad!” “Happy 25th anniversary to the best parents in the world! I hope my partner and I will celebrate as many years together as you two!” “Mom and Dad, your marriage is a shining example of true love and commitment. Wishing you a very happy 25th anniversary.” “Happy anniversary to my amazing parents. You have raised the bar so high by showing me love can conquer everything.” “I want to celebrate this special day that brought you both together. Happy 25th anniversary, and thank you for being the most supportive and loving parents.”

steps.title: Celebrate everything you love about your husband.
steps.content: Celebrate everything you love about your husband. Being married for 25 years is a huge accomplishment. Think about all of your husband’s qualities that have helped make your marriage so successful. Let him know how much you appreciate him and everything he’s done for you and your relationship. Here are some examples: [4] X Research source “You, my love, are my rock. Each day with you makes me even more grateful for your love. Here’s to 25 years!” “Even after all these years, you still make my heart race. Happy 25th anniversary, my love!” “Our marriage has been the greatest adventure of my life. Thank you for the past 25 years, and here’s to many more to come!” “You are the best thing that’s ever happened to me. Happy silver jubilee, darling!” “Not a single day has passed in the last 25 years when you didn’t sweep me off my feet. Today is no different. Happy anniversary to my incredible husband.” “I am so lucky to have a husband who makes each day special and better than the last. Happy anniversary, darling!” “Our house would never have become a home without you. Our kids would never have understood the meaning of family without you. I would have never experienced love without you. Happy 25th anniversary!” “If I had to go back in time and choose you again, I would have no doubts. You’re the best husband anyone could ask for. Happy 25th anniversary. I love you.” “Happy 25th anniversary to the person who made my life a living heaven. I love you to the moon and back!” “Today, we celebrate 25 years of love, trust, and commitment to each other. Happy 25th anniversary, dear.” “I’m so blessed to have a husband as kind, loving, and trustworthy as you. Thank you for everything you do. Happy 25th anniversary!” “Happy 25th anniversary to the one who still melts my heart with his gentle smile. I love you so much!” “Being your life partner for 25 years is a blessing beyond measure. Here’s to 25 more. Happy anniversary!” “I can’t believe we’ve been married for 25 years. It feels like our wedding was only yesterday. Happy silver anniversary, babe!” “Happy 25th anniversary to my favorite person in the world. I’m so blessed to call you my husband.”

steps.title: Tell your wife how much you love and appreciate her.
steps.content: Tell your wife how much you love and appreciate her. Marriage takes more than just love—it takes sacrifice and commitment. Think about everything your wife has done over the last 25 years. Celebrate what makes her and your marriage so special, and thank her for her love and support. Here are some examples: [5] X Research source “It takes a lifetime to find a woman like you in this world, and I’m so lucky to have been able to call you my wife for the past 25 years. Happy anniversary, sweetheart.” “Happy anniversary, my love! You have such a rare combination of beauty and kindness in you, and I’m blessed that you’re my wife.” “It’s been 25 years, and I still can’t wait to see what tomorrow holds for us. Happy anniversary to my beautiful wife.” “Even after 25 years, I fall more in love each time I look at you. Happy anniversary, my love.” “Today marks the 25th year of our incredible journey together. You are the one who inspires, challenges, and completes me. Happy anniversary!” “Happy 25th anniversary to my wife and my best friend. I don’t know what I’d do without you.” “I am so lucky to have a wonderful woman who makes my life complete. Happy 25th anniversary, honey.” “Happy 25th anniversary to the best wife in the world! Thanks for always having my back. I love you more than words can say.” “Even after all these years, I still look at you like it’s the very first day. Happy anniversary, my love.” “Happy anniversary to my amazing wife. I don’t know how you’ve put up with me for 25 years, but I hope you’ll do it for 25 more. I love you!” “Every good thing in my life has started with you. Thank you for blessing me with the most incredible 25 years. I love you.” “After 25 years, I still don’t know how I got so lucky. Happy anniversary to my incredible, loving wife.” “Happy 25th anniversary, my dear. My love for you grows stronger and stronger every day.” “I’m so grateful I’ve gotten to wake up by your side every morning for the past 25 years. Happy silver anniversary, my love.” “I never believed in soulmates until I met you. Happy 25th anniversary, sweetheart. I cherish you more every day.”

steps.title: Make the couple laugh with a funny message.
steps.content: Make the couple laugh with a funny message. You don’t always have to write a long, sentimental paragraph to celebrate someone’s 25th anniversary. If the couple you’re celebrating is more laidback, feel free to lightheartedly poke fun at their relationship. It’ll probably make them smile. Here are some examples: [6] X Research source “From cheers to tears and occasionally throwing spears, you two have seen it all over these 25 years. Happy anniversary!” “Never laugh at your wife’s choices. You are one of them. Happy 25th anniversary!” “Being married is like having a best friend who does not remember a single thing that you say. Happy anniversary, you two!” “Sorry, no refunds! Happy anniversary!” “Congrats on surviving 25 years of each other’s quirks. You deserve a medal or at least a long nap!” “25 years of marriage and you’re still together…. Must be true love or really good snacks!” “25 years of marriage and you still haven’t killed each other—that’s true love!” “Happy anniversary! After 25 years, you’re officially each other’s unpaid therapist!” “Happy 25 years of trying to figure out what to have for dinner every night!” “You’ve spent 25 years driving each other crazy, and you’re still going strong!” “YAY! You two still get along. Happy 25th anniversary!” “Happy anniversary! Let’s commemorate the day you both decided to stop looking for someone better.” “Here’s to 25 years of never watching what you wanted on TV!” “Congrats on 25 years of love, laughter, and ignoring each other’s selective hearing!” “Happy anniversary! After 25 years, you’re still each other’s biggest fan… and maybe biggest critic!”

steps.title: Celebrate your love on social media.
steps.content: Celebrate your love on social media. If you can’t be with your friends and family to celebrate your 25th wedding anniversary, consider posting about it on your social media. This way, everyone in your life can see how proud you are of your marriage. Here are some great caption ideas for Instagram, Facebook, or any other social media platform: “25 years later, and I’m still falling for you every day.” “Two hearts, 25 years, and a million memories.” “There's no one else in the world I'd rather have snoring beside me.” “You and me, forever and always.” “25 down, forever to go.” “The best love stories never end.” “When did we become an old married couple?” “25 years together… but who’s counting?” “A love story 25 years in the making—and we’re just getting started!” “From ‘I do’ to 25 years later—love never looked better!” “A quarter-century of love, and we’re still writing our story.” “After 25 years, we’re still the perfect match!” “Our love story is my favorite.” “Celebrating a love that stands the test of time.” “Here's to 25 years of love, laughter, and our happily ever after.”

steps.title: Celebrate the milestone with a famous quote.
steps.content: Celebrate the milestone with a famous quote. If you’re having trouble figuring out the right message to celebrate someone’s 25th anniversary, consider including a quote from a celebrity, historical figure, or your favorite movie or TV show. There are a ton of heartfelt and/or funny quotes about marriage to choose from. Here are a few: [7] X Research source “A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.” – Mignon McLaughlin “A great marriage is not when the ‘perfect couple’ comes together. It is when an imperfect couple learns to enjoy their differences.” – Dave Meurer “There is no more lovely, friendly, and charming relationship, communion, or company than a good marriage.” – Martin Luther “A good marriage is one which allows for change and growth in the individuals and in the way they express their love.” – Pearl S. Buck “We both said I do, and we haven’t agreed on a single thing since.” – So I Married an Ax Murderer “If you’re ever with a girl who’s too good for you, marry her.” – Valentine’s Day “My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.” – Winston Churchill “Marriage is an alliance entered into by a man who can't sleep with the window shut, and a woman who can't sleep with the window open.” – George Bernard Shaw “The bonds of matrimony are like any other bonds—they mature slowly.” – Peter De Vries “Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.” – H. L. Mencken “Remember that creating a successful marriage is like farming: You have to start over again every morning.” – H. Jackson Brown, Jr. “Love is sharing your popcorn.” – Charles Schultz “I have heard that whoever loves is in no condition old.” – Ralph Waldo Emerson “Love is an ideal thing, marriage a real thing.” – Johann Wolfgang von Goethe “Love like there’s no tomorrow, and if tomorrow comes, love again.” – Max Lucado

steps.title: Personalize a gift to make the anniversary even more special.
steps.content: Personalize a gift to make the anniversary even more special. Whether you’re celebrating your friends, parents, or your own 25th anniversary, choosing the perfect gift can make the occasion even more special. Think about what gift reflects the person or couple’s interests and their journey together. Here are a few ideas to get you started: Custom jewelry engraved with their names or anniversary date A photo album with photos from their 25 years together A surprise weekend getaway to one of their favorite places A scrapbook filled with warm wishes from family and friends A meaningful keepsake, like an engraved picture frame or custom artwork Something silver to reflect the “silver jubilee”

steps.title: How do you write a personalized 25th anniversary card?
steps.content: How do you write a personalized 25th anniversary card? Start by congratulating the couple on their milestone achievement. Express how happy you are for them and let them know how they inspire you as a couple. Thank them for the example they set and wish them the best for their future. Try to mention things that are specific to them and their relationship.

steps.title: What symbol and color represent a 25th wedding anniversary?
steps.content: What symbol and color represent a 25th wedding anniversary? Silver (both the color and the metal) is the symbol of a 25th anniversary, also known as a silver jubilee. It symbolizes beauty, grace, and purity. Couples often receive silver gifts like silverware and jewelry to celebrate the occasion. [8] X Research source

steps.title: How do you celebrate your 25th anniversary?
steps.content: How do you celebrate your 25th anniversary? If you’re celebrating your 25th wedding anniversary, consider planning a romantic getaway, hosting a silver-themed party, renewing your vows, or simply spending quality time with your spouse doing what you enjoy. Celebrate your love and reflect on your journey together. [9] X Research source

steps.title: How do you write a 25th-anniversary speech?
steps.content: How do you write a 25th-anniversary speech? Make your speech personal by sharing anecdotes about your spouse or the couple you’re celebrating. Mention how they’ve grown together and all the accomplishments they’ve achieved. Make a toast for many more years of love.
